title: Use e-Tickets
description: You can save money for every flight you take by using an e-ticket, and more importantly, help save the planet by reducing paper waste.

title: Start a compost pile
description: Compost is an incredible way to improve the soil in your your garden. It's also free, easy to maintain, and good for the environment.
